sentences.cn: 结构混乱、情节不连贯的故事

sentences.en: As the evening progressed, he became increasingly incoherent.
sentences.cn: 随着夜色加深，他说话越来越前言不搭后语了。

sentences.en: As with incoherent light one then adds irradiances rather than amplitudes.
sentences.cn: 就和非相干光的情况一样,这时是将辐照度相加而不是把振幅相加.

sentences.en: Ben, drunk and incoherent, slumped in a chair.
sentences.cn: 本醉得语无伦次，一屁股跌坐在一把椅子上。

sentences.en: He is incoherent, delusional, suffering auditory hallucinations.
sentences.cn: 他出现无逻辑的, 妄想的, 幻听的症状.

sentences.en: He was so drunk that he was quite incoherent.
sentences.cn: 他喝得这样醉,说起话来语无伦次.

sentences.en: I went over and looked at that huge incoherent failure of a house once more.
sentences.cn: 我走过去再看一眼那座庞大而杂乱的意味着失败的房子.

sentences.en: Kennedy murmured some incoherent words , and kept his eye fixed on Dr. Fergusson.
sentences.cn: 肯尼迪眼睛直勾勾地盯着弗格森博士,嘴里不知在嘟囔着什么.

sentences.en: Prissy burst into tears and incoherent mumblings: " Poke!
sentences.cn: 百里茜也放声大哭,断断续续地咕囔着: " 波克!

sentences.en: She became quite incoherent as the disease got worse.
sentences.cn: 随着疾病的恶化,她变得相当语无伦次起来.

sentences.en: She broke off, incoherent with anger.
sentences.cn: 她气得话都说不清了，便住口了。
她语无伦次地抽咽起来。

sentences.en: The essay is ungrammatical and incoherent.
The man was almost incoherent with fear.
sentences.cn: 那个人吓得几乎语无伦次了。

sentences.en: The pictures on the wall, all of them very brown, looked vague and incoherent.
sentences.cn: 墙上所有的画都灰溜溜的, 显得模糊而支离破碎.

words.tran_cn: 不连贯；语无伦次；无内聚力；无胶粘性（等于incoherence）
不合逻辑的,不连贯的,偏离的
不同的,不合谐的,不统一的,相反的

trans.tran_cn: 思想不连贯的，语无伦次的，支离破碎的，夹七夹八，不相干
trans.tran_en: speaking in a way that cannot be understood, because you are drunk, feeling a strong emotion etc
